item.title: LIVE: Two National Guardsmen shot near the White House
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: 2 National Guard members dead after shooting near White House: W.Va. governor
item.description: Two National Guardsmen are in critical condition after being shot near the White House.

item.title: Georgia prosecutor drops election interference case against Trump, others
item.description: The Fulton County election interference case against President Trump and others has been dismissed after the prosecutor who took over the case asked t...

item.title: Driver arrested after allegedly attempting to strike LGBTQ running club with car
item.description: A driver in Florida was arrested after attempting to strike members of an LGBTQ running club on Monday night, according to police.

item.title: WATCH: Storms disrupting Thanksgiving travel plans
item.description: Millions of Americans are on the move for Thanksgiving, with rough weather already causing turbulence as two storm systems sweep across the country.
